meanings.definition: A rare earth element with the symbol Pr and atomic number 59.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study praseodymiums to learn more about rare elements.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the praseodymiums under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: When the praseodymiums threw a party, all the other elements wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: The praseodymiums in the periodic table shine like hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The praseodymiums glowed softly in the dark, captivating everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The plural form of praseodymium, referring to multiple atoms or ions of the element.
meanings.sent1: In the experiment, they combined different praseodymiums to observe their reactions.
meanings.sent2: The scientist carefully measured the weight of the praseodymiums in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The praseodymiums lined up in a row, ready to participate in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent4: Among all the elements, the praseodymiums stood out like a colorful crowd.
meanings.sent5: The jar contained a mix of praseodymiums, each with its own unique properties.
